name: Conversations-Inspirations: Everyday Polish
description: Through a series of thematic modules based on everyday communicative situations in contemporary Poland students develop Polish language skills in the four linguistic competencies: listening, reading, writing, and speaking. The course is based on a communicative-functional approach to language. It means that even though students are regularly exposed to new grammatical structures, their work focuses primarily on practical, diverse uses of language in real-life situations.
prerequisites: SLA206Y1 or SLA207H1 or permission of instructor
